@BricksTamland @andrewcdole @carloss86123360 @LadeBackk So essentially you can have to pay taxes on more gains than your account value shows? 

If you realize 200 gains. You owe taxes on the 200 but then re enter that security and lose 300 and realize that loss you don’t get a break on the 200 Gained?
